item.title: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A)
item.description: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A) in Creston. Turn left for BC-3 West to Salmo and Castlegar. Turn right for (BC-3 East), BC-3A North/Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-21 North at Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North at Erickson Road. Turn right for Erickson Road east and BC-3 east. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 west.

item.title: BC-21 North Approaching Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North approaching Erickson Road in Creston. Use Erickson Road west for BC-3 East/Creston/Cranbrook. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 East to Nelson and Castlegar.

item.title: BC-21 North - Think Metric
item.description: Think Metric sign on BC-21 north, just past the Rykerts Port of Entry. 50 MPH = 80 km/h.

item.title: 16th Ave. South at Erickson St. - Creston
item.description: 16th Ave. South at Erickson St. in Creston. Turn right for BC-21; left for BC-3 (no Crowsnest symbol on the BC-3 shield).
